songs.title: Ball So Much*
songs.lyrics:
Lyrics from Snippet

[Chorus]
I ball so much, I make that shit look easy
You talk down on me like you ain't believe me
I know there's times when I thought you were greedy
Now it's my time, you gon' lie like you need me
I ball so much, I make that shit look easy
You talk down on me like you ain't believe me
I know there's times when I thought you were greedy
Now it's my time, you gon' lie like you need me

[Verse]
I got rich, eighty-thousand for my wrist
Now my business is a jet, everything I gotta get
[...]
